Title: Chapter Two: Lupus in Fabula
Writer: Jeremy Slater (created by), William Peter Blatty (inspired by the novel by), Heather Bellson
Actors: Alfonso Herrera, Ben Daniels, Hannah Kasulka, Brianne Howey
Plot: Father Marcus joins forces with Father Tomas, the Rances' relationship with the demon deepens, while a series of bizarre ritual killings begins.
